website_summaries.verdict: For riders who want a bicycle built for two and don't mind the high price tag, this sturdy tandem bike will provide a smooth ride and hours of fun once the mechanisms are mastered.
pros: Stands out for its tandem design that allows most duos to ride comfortably together
In addition to 21 speeds, it offers disc brakes for optimal control
cons: Has a learning curve, especially for those who have never ridden a tandem bike
Somewhat difficult to control when riders' combined weight is over 400 pounds

website_summaries.verdict: Schwinn is a respected brand in the bicycle industry, and this tandem model is worthy of the name. Ideal for riders who might want to go off-road occasionally.
pros: Tires are designed for varied terrain
cons: Can require professional tuning and repairs

customer_reviews.title: I had spent a great deal of time looking online and reading reviews
customer_reviews.text: I had spent a great deal of time looking online and reading reviews. Very discouraged by the negative reviews on all the other online tandems in my price range. This bike had somewhat favorable reviews but not 100%. I pulled the trigger and could not be happier. I did what one other reviewer did I had a reputable bike shop assemble the bike, I did not even open the box. The bike has been better the anticipated. It was nicer in appearance than I expected and fits me I am 5'11" my wife is 5'2". It is an absolute joy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: After a few rides I feel like this is a great bike for the money. We don't intend to put 1000s of miles on it, it's mainly for being able to bike places with our 8 year old. She is just barely tall enough for the back seat so the size is perfect for growing into. The bike is comfortable and works great. It arrived very quickly, almost a month earlier than predicted, and was not damaged in shipping. We put it together quickly and easily and off we went. The wheels were true, tires are a good tread design for all purpose yet not too knobby. If things change I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Paul7

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall, good experience with this bike. It needed some adjustments. The one thing which is pretty annoying is that the pedals will hit the ground on minor bumps. Maybe it's a tandem thing, not sure. I transport via a rear bike rack... it's not advised but works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon  Addict

customer_reviews.title: Front wheel axel(skewer) assembly completely missing,PLUS rear wheel springs
customer_reviews.text: UPON OPENING THE BOX,I am missing the entire front wheel axel assembly-THE ADJUSTMENT NUT, THE OUTER SPRING, THE SKEWER(axel) THE INNER SPRING,THE QUICK RELEASE LEVER and also the 2 springs on the back wheel assembly.PLEASE EMAIL ME WITH YOUR PHONE NUMBER!, THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: William F Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Great for around town.
customer_reviews.text: All components are old technology and not particularly lightweight, but for the price, I wasn't expecting race quality parts either. I intend to upgrade a few things and overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Razmik Rashidyan

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price was good
customer_reviews.text: Met expectation and feel the value for the price was good. Easy to assemble. Here are a couple issues. The front shock cause the peddles to easily hit high spots like going over small curbs which can be avoided by thinking ahead and leveling your peddles before arriving to such places. Also, it doesn't roll as freely as most bikes. Lastly, the although I understand why the frame is larger on the bottom part of the assembly, it limits add on parts.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I have put 20 miles on this bike and I am still loving it. Can't pop off the side walk and when I turn my shoes hit the front tire but after a few miles I learned how to not do those things. I am 230 pounds and my wife on the rear is 105 and this bike does a great job around town in central park and we even went on a dirt trail hahahaha I recommend buying. Also watch a YouTube video on how to adjust the disk brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Chester F.

customer_reviews.title: Check very, VERY carefully that you're ordering the right size!
customer_reviews.text: The frame size is very misleading. I'm 5'11" and would typically fit very well with other "showroom" bikes described as "large frame." This "large" frame, however, probably would have been better suited for somebody closer to 7 foot tall. When my wife (also 5'11") tried to dismount after only straddling the frame, the frame was so tall that it caught her foot and she fell, fracturing her wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I had to write a review - this bike is amazing! My husband, who is not some bike assembly expert, put it together in just a few hours. I ride it with my (on the tall side) 7 year old. We have a blast. It’s a great ride and I’m glad we spung for the version with gears. We easily ride 10 or more miles a day. I was really worried about how I’d transport it, but it fits just fine on a bike rack...more or less.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Great Value- lightweight aluminum frame and disc brakes for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: We decided to trade in our lower priced, heavier tandem for the Schwinn, and have not been disappointed. Our observations after riding for 3 months- nice bike, lots of compliments on the appearance. Quality is good for this price range, assembly was fairly easy (the Owner's manual attempts to be a "one size fits all" guide, which results in a lot of confusion for the reader). We have noticed the two minor shortcomings that are mentioned in many other reviews- the turn radius is very limited, and the foot pedals could be better. Overall, we are very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KSP825

customer_reviews.title: BEST PANDEMIC PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this bike and only took us an hour to assemble. Purchase bike to ride with my 8 year old during the pandemic. It’s a great way to control she is safe and near me yet we still can ride and have an amazing time getting out the house working out. Caution: it takes some getting use to. Back seat driver has to trust the front to lead or you’ll crash. Once we got the hang of it we had a great time riding, holding conversations, talking about things around us and laughing. BEST PANDEMIC PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Burks

customer_reviews.title: Great Tandem!
customer_reviews.text: I think that for the money this bike is great! Aluminum frame, wheels, etc. Disc Brakes, all materials seem good quality (not high dollar, but good) fit, finish was excellent. I thought the welds and paint job were super. Some complained about front fork but it seems fine. Only complaint: tires seem a little soft at max pressure. I’ll probably go a little higher on the psi.
customer_reviews.author: TJT

customer_reviews.title: happy purchase but that price tag.... eeck
customer_reviews.text: purchased a tandem for our parents. They seem to like the bike It was fairly easy to put together. Breaks are good but front breaks were very weak or too weak to actually do anything, after adjusting they feel better. While there is no questioning, this bike is one of the most affordable tandem out there, but still, the price tag is steep. Should tandem rhym with price overdose when it is a little more pieces of metal slapped together?
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: Good Light Bike after some minor adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: The frame appears to be well built and it is light aluminum. The bike is made in china with some of the usual rushed factory assembly. The aluminum pieces that are threaded for parts mounting and the bolts going in those holes should be chased with a metric tap and die set. The threads were not completely cut and the screws would get tight and bind before completely seating. The screws and threads should also be thoroughly coated with grease before assembly to avoid future damage when replacing or adjusting parts several years down the line. After tuning adjustment the bike rides very easy and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: JamesC

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Oh My! Boy were we pleasantly surprised when we assembled this Schwinn tandem. Not only a great price, but quick delivery, packed well, paint job as good as it gets, aluminum frame, front and rear disc brakes, 21 speeds, 47 lbs....could go on and on but don't for one minute be afraid to pull the trigger on this one. It's a pleasant cruiser. Outstanding for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: goldwingers

customer_reviews.title: Love the bike!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and it looks better in person than I expected. My wife and I took it for its maiden voyage today, 8 miles. It was amazing. Quality looks great and expect it to last. Very Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Tomasevic

customer_reviews.title: Everything i expected.
customer_reviews.text: Only took about an hour to set up. Most of the bike comes assembled. Great deal for a low end tandem. I convinced my 9yo to ride with me, and she wanted to go again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Np

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: We ride Specialized bikes in Wisconsin in the summer. We wanted a bike in Florida for fun. The Schwinn Tandem far exceeded our expectations. Lots of Fun!!! Easy to assemble. Carefully packaged and looks great. I am 5'6" and ride in the front. It just fits me...I wouldn't want to be any shorter for the front. Taller would be fine in front. My wife is 5'4" and rides in the back. More height adjustments for rear rider. Front suspension gives it a smooth ride.
customer_reviews.author: Private Pilot in Green Bay

customer_reviews.title: This makes a tandem fun, sporty and affordable
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat this tandem for the money, would love to know how it compares to higher prices ones. Rides well, front shock, my family is trying to wear this out and can't. Plenty of adjustments seat and handlebar-wise to get comfortable. Brakes can stop 450 lbs payload of people well, shifts are easy. Only concern is after probably 1500 miles rear hub is very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: This bicycle seemed the best option to buy at this price-point
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle seemed the best option to buy at this price-point, and did not disappoint. It was packaged adequately and relatively simple to assemble. Upon first impressions it seems suitable for a variety of people to ride. One negative: the enclosed manual was not specific to this model and so certain aspects of assembly had to be figured out autonomously. For us that was not a problem, but it's not the most reassuring of beginnings!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: well made,but skimps on comfort areas.
customer_reviews.text: This was a hard one to write- the bike is well made, gear shift (21 speed) works well, frame is aluminum and it has disc brakes- 2 problems- The quality of the seats is terrible- my wife rode with me for 1/2 hour ans is still sore after 5 days- The rear handle bars have limited adjustment and affects the seat position in the front- Pity to make a sound bike and skimp on the things that affect comfort- If Icanreplace the bars and seat andget a good riding position I will raise "stars" to 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Works just as good as a more expensive one we had previously.
customer_reviews.text: changed the tires to hybrid type for smoother and quieter ride....also replaced the fork and was able to get the pedals off the ground so they no longer touch in a turn or hit over a bump. The frame on this bike is worth the asking price of the whole bike. It's a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this bike! Super fun to ride. My daughter is 10 and fits fine on the back. The only thing I could mention is that I’m 5’6” and even at the lowest position it’s about an inch more of a reach for my legs than I’m comfortable riding. Doable for me but if you’re shorter than 5’6” and plan to be the front rider it’s going to be tricky.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a first tandem bike
customer_reviews.text: We just wanted a bike for cruising in the neighborhood since we had to cancel our summer travel due to COVID... so we used some trip $$ and bought this... and couldn't be happier! We're both in our 50's and just wanted some fresh air and exercise each night, and this bike fits the bill perfectly! Assembly was straightforward, EXCEPT for the front fork, and how it tightens... took some extra online research, but once it was done it has performed great.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Benson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: April 2020--I bought this so that my son with special needs could ride bikes with us. It could not have worked out better. The front fork seems a bit mushy getting onto the bike, but otherwise, it makes for a comfortable ride. One of the pedals will hit on a large bump, but you figure this out quickly and just keep them even when the bump comes. Rarely happens if street riding. It is lighter than I thought it would be for a big bike. Gears shift smoothly. Disc brakes work great. Might need to get a more comfortable seat. Although it's not terrible. Delivery was awesome--tracked right to the second!
customer_reviews.author: Erica S

customer_reviews.title: CHECK FOR ALL THE PARTS
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike for the money. Shifters and brakes work very well. Front shock fork is cheap and not really needed. Bike came on day promised and was easy to assemble - however - we were short the stoker stem, therefore we could not install the stoker handlebar. Contacted supplier right away and after 3 weeks we are still waiting for the part.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn seems to have some customer service issues
customer_reviews.text: The model I received is very different than the owner's manual that came with the bike which is not for this model. I called/emailed Schwinn but they have not responded to my simple request for the correct manual. The front brakes, forks, handlebars, gear systems are completely different and I do not want to pay a bike shop $100+ to assemble the bike when all I need is the correct manual so I will return the bike to Amazon if I don't receive a response from Schwinn soon. Otherwise it seems like a really good well made and nice looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: D&D in Monterey

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my preliminary review. Relatively easy to install. I have limited physical abilities and strength issues. I had a friend help pull out of box to save me the hassle. I'm sure I could have done it myself with some effort. Putting bike together was relatively easy.ive yet to have my mom ride it. So I will report bike shortly. Looks good sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: cayce

customer_reviews.title: Better for the price out there.
customer_reviews.text: This bike was a disappointment. The front fork is garbage, way too soft. Saddles are cheep and uncomfortable just to name a few item. Just bought this bike a few months ago and now looking to sell it because it such a horrible ride.
customer_reviews.author: Ragen

customer_reviews.title: I was delighted to find that there was no shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: I received the bicycle today. I was delighted to find that there was no shipping damage. The Schwinn instruction manual made assembly easy. I was impressed with the quality of the frame and because of good packing , there were no scratches. I am looking forward to taking it for a ride tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: James Bach

customer_reviews.title: Disc brakes, 21 speeds, easy to assemble - This is one of the best Tandems around!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is better than those single brake ones that are a little cheaper. It came earlier than expected and went together very easily! It even had the brakes already adjusted! Shifted great right out of the box. The rear passenger bars are good and adjust well. I highly recommend this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Epp

customer_reviews.title: THIS BIKE IS AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: We just rode our bike for the first time. THIS BIKE IS AWESOME !!!! YEAH! We are going to have alot of fun on this. We live in Northern Virginia right next to 44 miles of the WO&D trail. There are many bars on the way !! This bike rides so nice. assembly was very easy too. It came 80% assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun... great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: 1) Came earlier than the committed date. 2) This is a high quality bike for an unbelievable low price. 3) My wife and I have expensive bikes and we are having more fun with this tandem. 5) I have been recommending this to other friends of ours and they are impressed when they look at the quality of the bike (gears, brakes, seat quality, bike frame quality)
customer_reviews.author: B. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Please design bicycles in the future to feel more comfortable. Good quality 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: That was not comfortable for us, but had really good quality .
customer_reviews.author: Babak nikjoy

customer_reviews.title: On my third one.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap hardware, so you cannot loosen a factory tightened bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy locally.
customer_reviews.text: Was missing some hardware which I notified seller immediately. Company finally got in touch with me 5 months later!!! On top of this they wanted to charge me for the bolts missing! Not a great company to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know what to expect at this price point, but this bike is excellent. Comfy seats and handlebars. sturdy frame, and excellent disc brakes.
customer_reviews.author: YuLee

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, super easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great first tandem. My 9 year old was able to ride comfortably on the medium version once we removed the reflector on the back post and dropped it all the way. One problem - back tire appears to have arrived punctured and tube type is unusual Kenda 26x2.125/2.35 nowhere to be found. HELP?
customer_reviews.author: sander

customer_reviews.title: Avid bike rider
customer_reviews.text: Products not too bad for the money. The only problem with the bike is that the front shock bottoms out as soon as both riders get on the bike. Might as well not even having a front shock. I did call Schwinn technical support and they said there's no preload adjustment. However if it is defective Schwinn offered to replace it which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Carney

customer_reviews.title: Take to professionals for assembly ($90.00)
customer_reviews.text: Assembled and had to take to bike shop for tune up prior to riding--- cost an extra $90.00. Nice ride post tune up. You need good knowledge of assembly and fine tuning BEFORE you ride this.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Rides great, good brakes, smooth comfy ride
customer_reviews.text: Only used once so far, but it rides great. Disc brakes are helpful. You can't ride hands free upfront (fork angle is too steep), but I guess you wouldn't want to anyway. Center stand is much nicer than a side stand. Seats and grips also comfy. Assembly was OK, but I am pretty good with tools.
customer_reviews.author: H. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Exploring our area in a bike built for two!
customer_reviews.text: This bicycle is simply the best thing I have purchased for my husband and I. There are so many trails around here in New York to ride without being in the busy streets. It came quickly, like two days, well packed. Awesome purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for better, but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for a charity give back. On one the gear disc was warped and on the other, the chain cracked and fell off on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Martini Hoban

customer_reviews.title: Great value, for a Great bike with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I purchased this bike so that we could participate in the Great Cycle Challenge. This is a great bike except for the low bottom bracket. If your pedals are not in the horizon position when you hit a bump in the road, they hit the pavement. A previous reviewer suggested changing out the fork to a non-suspension one might fix this, we’re going to do this on our next service. Footnote do not call schwinn for help their service was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money Well spent !!!
customer_reviews.text: Best tandem bike for the buck! Shwinn lives up to its history! They've been around and know for its quality. If you're wanting to bond with the mrs and be able to chat enjoying the outdoors while exercising on a top of the line bike!!! This is it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casual tandem for older cyclists like us...
customer_reviews.text: Good price for what we get. Good frame, great disk brakes, acceptable gear shift but not shimano 105 quality, soft front suspension but OK for us under combined 300 pounds. Only negative are the very poor wheel bearings. I had to loosen back bearing as it was making a strong grinding noise: Certainly will have to replace wheel bearings in the near future as well as noisy tires designed for gravel roads... Recommended for casual riders or for more advanced when some components are upgraded, like replacing pedals for BMX clip types as we did.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Zufellato

customer_reviews.title: The bike shop said this is a really good bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: I took it to the bike shop and he built it for 75$. The bike shop said this is a really good bike for the money. He said the features are usually found on more expensive bikes.
customer_reviews.author: stat

customer_reviews.title: Trial before purchasing is important.
customer_reviews.text: Needed better instructions. That received was for a different model. It is best to try before purchasing. Having difficulty finding a bike rack for SUV that handles a tandem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: 😁
customer_reviews.text: Love the feeling of the open road.. But not so much my husband! Great cardio...
customer_reviews.author: Christy C Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my tandem bike 2 hours ago. I noticed immediately that the back handle bar rubber was torn and the scratched. The bake tire was attached when delivered, but the thing holding the gear was bent so we couldn't ride. Overall I'm very displeased with this item. The shipping box was perfectly intact.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an absolute blast. My wife and I put 40 miles on it the first week!
customer_reviews.author: PDQ

customer_reviews.title: great tandem bike
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Outstanding beginner-intermediate level tandem. I was prepared to drop $100-$150+ for assembly and tune. Assembly required minimal skill set, tune up not required. Literally, slap the handle bars and pedals and wheels on, you're good to go. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be able to ride, right?
customer_reviews.text: So the back tire wobbles and does not turn all the way. I have yet to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Butts

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is the short distance of the pedals from the ground. It gets caught to the ground on turns.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sadigh

customer_reviews.title: Takes about .5 hour to build
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking bike. Similar bikes in local bike shops for over 1200 dollars. I purchased two water bottles, a bell, and rack on the back. Everybody says it's not the same Schwinn as years ago, but this bike is great.
customer_reviews.author: byron hopp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light for a tandem - made some upgrades to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty light for a tandem - made some upgrades to the grips, pedals, seats. I am thinking about going to rigid fork to stop the bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: SuperLimo

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Truly Tandem bike
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Truly Tandem bike. And great service. Our first product was defective and Amazon did a great job of taking defective piece right away and replaced with new one.
customer_reviews.author: Arvind Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bike, super deal.  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing purchase. Incredible deal. My son and I love it. We passed some dude on a motorcycle, doing 30+ mph on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for frustration!!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to assemble; instruction booklet not for this model of handlebars and wheels
customer_reviews.author: Jose Iraheta

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise and it appears to be built
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Birthday present for my Wife and she loves it. Good exercise and it appears to be built well
customer_reviews.author: Clara Belle Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This bike is high quality and design. Must say riding a tandem is very different for the front rider. A little heavier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: It is not a professional bike and I don't recommend it for a race
customer_reviews.text: I have 57 and my wife has 57 and we are enjoying it a lot. It is not a professional bike and I don't recommend it for a race, but for local use (15 or 20 miles) is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a light weight sturdy Bike for two.
customer_reviews.text: Comes largely assembled. Completed assembly in a couple hours. Bike seems light weight and very sturdy. Very comfortable for me and my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Lubben

customer_reviews.title: Recieved d package in perfect condition, very nice price
customer_reviews.text: Recieved d package in perfect condition, very nice price, comfortable ride so far, will try some semi aggressive ride this week, i just hope it doesn't break so easily. 8-17-17 did it had fun officially love d bike
customer_reviews.author: Jojjie

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Good bike. The assembly instructions need to be updated concerning handle bar assembly
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Fun buy
customer_reviews.text: Bike rides low in the middle so you have to stay on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Handlebars arived scratch as well as a crack in the gear changer
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Very low frame!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our special needs son to ride in the rear seat. However the unexpectedly low frame (3” from pedal to ground!) is deeply disappointing and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great bike but driver's seat was to high, wonder if the medium frame would be lower.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bike but just to high on the driver/front
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one issue
customer_reviews.text: Pedal Broke off in first four rides. Otherwise great bike and extremely comfortable and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R Bizzarro

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble, light weight bike
customer_reviews.text: Purely amazing. Took all of 20 minutes to assemble, put some lube on the chains, some air in the tires and go!! The gears come pre-adjusted, all 21 of them. Comfortable seats, all aluminum , even the rims are alu. This will be a lot of fun on the trail
customer_reviews.author: Dirk De Vuyst

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is our first tandem .. being visualy impaired this is great to be able to ride a bike again. Very sturdy, comfortable. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mamagardener

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bicycle! My hubby and I have enjoyed many fun bike rides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the start!
customer_reviews.text: Had to have the shifting cables replaced, before riding, as they were kink at the handle bars!
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Bike Saddle
customer_reviews.text: Seat is very stiff. Had to buy replacement to avoid but pain....
customer_reviews.author: Maozhe

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy for my bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I Like so much I ride my bicycle with my wife at the beach I love it
customer_reviews.author: carlos cespedes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to ride
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with our new Schwinn tandem. I can finally ride with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: GERMAN W. MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: This bike is marriage therapy😂
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and ride. The seats are a little hard and we did replace the front seat with a softer one
customer_reviews.author: Scott Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Back brake cable
customer_reviews.text: What kind of back brakes cables I should get? All to short
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great ride lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: I have been cycling for 45 years now. Out of box some assembly, a few minor adjustments,great ride lots of fun, worth it.!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My wife liked it better then our previous tandem
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike for the money. My wife liked it better then our previous tandem. Bike build was simple, put on tires, pedals and handlebars, everything else was in place. We had to do adjustments on both the disc brakes and gears for proper performance, but that would normally be expected with any bike build. Bottom line: I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to install seats, pedals, tightened handle bar and it was ready to ride. Brakes and everything else was already adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived fast and well packaged. This is a great quality bike and a lot of fun riding it. I'm very happy with this bike!!
customer_reviews.author: Milton M Martins

customer_reviews.title: Schwin Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not good product bike. I bought this bike considering Schwinn brands but this like Schwinn is cutting the corner by selling inferior quality. Within 4th trip with its started making all sort of weird noise. I got it checked with Dicks store where they mentioned the bearing in front and back need to replaced because they are worn out. It will cost me extra $125 dollar. I tried to find Schwinn customer support but cannot find anything anywhere. My suggestion will be to buy any other bike which has better quality. Will not recommend anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: one star for now pending evaluation of a bike mechanic.
customer_reviews.text: cheapest Drive ever! My rear crank is bent, wobbly and touching the frame. This bike has only two PROS: price and disc brakes! will return this depending on my LBS advice. If pacific or shwinn included in its desc that you need to overhaul the while drive and tuned the bike during assembly, then i understand. but i bought this thinking i can at least use it in my camping trip...so there is your one star, i wouldve given it 3 stars minimum if it was usable because of price.
customer_reviews.author: oragon

product_meta.title: Schwinn Twinn Adult Tandem Bicycle, Low Step-Through, 26-Inch Wheels, Medium Frame, Grey
product_meta.description: Founded in 1895, Schwinn is an American icon, building some of the best-known and best-loved bicycles of all time. From its very beginning in Chicago, Illinois, the Schwinn mission has been to develop bicycles that allow people to experience the confidence and freedom that comes from riding a bike. Hit the road with a friend with the Schwinn Twinn Tandem Bicycle. This Schwinn aluminum tandem frame features an extra low step-thru rear bar to comfortably fit smaller riders. A 21-speed Shimano EZ-Fire trigger shifters and a Shimano rear derailleur provide an extended gear range and smooth shifting on every ride. Mechanical disc brakes offer superior all-condition stopping power on the road and on the trail. The main set of handlebars and a Schwinn suspension fork put you in complete control when you ride. Ergonomic grips and plush fitness saddles create a comfortable and enjoyable riding experience. This tandem bike ships ready to be assembled. The Schwinn Twinn Tandem Large Bicycle's wheels measure 26 inches.
feature_bullets: Hit the road with a friend with the Schwinn Twinn Tandem Bicycle. This Schwinn aluminum tandem frame features an extra low step-thru rear bar to comfortably fit smaller riders.
A 21-speed Shimano EZ-Fire trigger shifters and a Shimano rear derailleur provide an extended gear range and smooth shifting on every ride.
Mechanical disc brakes offer superior all-condition stopping power on the road and on the trail.
The main set of handlebars and a Schwinn suspension fork put you in complete control when you ride. Ergonomic grips and plush fitness saddles create a comfortable and enjoyable riding experience.
This tandem bike ships ready to be assembled, has a 5 year limited warranty, and the wheels measure 26 inches.
